channel.title: [PI] Double EXP Time Limit
channel.description: I was wondering how I would put a time limit on the double xp ring when ever it is worn. Like let's say you have an hour time limit and you equip it for 30 mins and take it off for 30 mins, you would still have 30 mins left. Would I add an event?

item.title: [PI] Double EXP Time Limit
item.dc:creator: @Carcool Carcool
item.description:
@Carcool wrote:

if itemid = ####; || c.wearitem
operate option//4 optons on ring, the “operate” option
c.sendmessage(“You have " + get.timeleft + " time left for item to wear down.”);
} else {
c.sendmessage(“You need to wear this item to activate double exp.”);
}
break;

Then create a void similiar to ths

public void timeleft
if playeriswearingitem ####;
c.startimer;
}
return;
}

public void startimer
if playeriswearingitem ####;
c.startime
}

then import the java timer tging.

something like that, i copied it from my own base. I don’t know how to translate that XD

Read full topic
